title: Actor Julian Sands confirmed dead after going missing months ago in California mountains
description: Remains found last week in mountains near Los Angeles were confirmed to belong to actor Julian Sands, who has been missing since he went hiking in the Mt. Baldy wilderness in January.

title: In a post-presidency audio recording, Trump discusses classified docs
description: In an audio recording recently made public, Donald Trump appears to discuss a sensitive military document and acknowledges he did not declassify it.

title: Nancy Pelosi to headline a fundraiser for Democrat seeking Sen. Kyrsten Sinema's seat
description: Former Speaker Nancy Pelosi will be the special guest at a fundraiser for Democratic Rep. Ruben Gallego as he runs for Sen. Kyrsten Sinema's Arizona Senate seat.

title: Concertgoer appears to throw ashes at Pink during performance
description: A fan tossed what appeared to be a bag containing the ashes of their dead mother on stage at a weekend Pink concert for the British Summer Time Festival in London.

title: Ryan Seacrest will succeed Pat Sajak as host of 'Wheel of Fortune'
description: Ryan Seacrest will take over as host of the syndicated game show "Wheel of Fortune" after longtime master of ceremonies Pat Sajak at the end of next year.

title: Blistering heat grips the South and puts Texas under triple-digit temperatures
description: A relentless heat wave is gripping Texas, with temperatures escalating to record highs and surpassing 110 degrees Fahrenheit in some parts of the state.

title: Supreme Court rules against giving state legislatures unchecked control over federal elections
description: The Supreme Court rules against the "independent state legislature theory," which could have stripped state courts of power to review election laws.

title: Misconduct and errors allowed Jeffrey Epstein to commit suicide, DOJ finds
description: A cascade of misconduct, negligence and errors by employees the federal Bureau of Prisons created the conditions that allowed accused sex offender Jeffrey Epstein to hang himself in his Manhattan jail cell in 2019.

title: Supreme Court rules for online stalker convicted of making 'true threats'
description: The Supreme Court said the jury that convicted Counterman for abusive messages to musician Coles Whalen should have found whether he intended genuine threats.

title: Follow the latest news and conversations at the Aspen Ideas Festival
description: Follow the latest news and conversations at the Aspen Ideas Festival

title: Georgia secretary of state to meet with special counsel investigators
description: Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger will be interviewed by special counsel Jack Smith’s office on Wednesday in Atlanta, his office confirmed to NBC News.

title: What’s fueling the rise in Hindu nationalism in the U.S.
description: To some, Modi represents the face of a new, better India. To others, he's influencing an era of Hindu nationalism — one that’s rapidly spreading in the U.S.

title: Four-year-old rapper Van Van takes social media by storm
description: As part of African American Music Appreciation Month, NBC News’ Zinhle Essamuah sat down with four-year-old rapper Savannah, known as Van Van, to talk about how her songs and dances have racked up millions of views on social media.

title: Hundreds of flights canceled as severe weather slams East Coast
description: Millions across the country are waking up to more severe weather Tuesday, with hundreds of flights in and out of the East Coast cancelled overnight after thunderstorms struck the region and a deadly heatwave smothered the South.

title: 'Planned in plain sight': Senate report finds intel agencies failed in the lead-up to Jan. 6
description: The FBI and federal agencies failed to prepare for the Jan. 6 Capitol attack and downplayed the potential for violence despite online threats, Senate report finds.

title: TikTok announces it will establish a youth council in hopes of building a better platform for teens
description: TikTok announced it will establish a youth council that will be tasked with creating safety tools that are more effective for its younger users.

title: Tech leaders discuss future of AI at Aspen Ideas Festival
description: Artificial intelligence was the talk of the Aspen Ideas Festival. NBC News' Tom Llamas sits down with panelist Daniel Huttonlocher in the Colorado Rockies to talk about AI's impact on society and its future. NBCUniversal News Group is the media partner of Aspen Ideas Festival.

title: Suspect arrested after couple celebrating 50th wedding anniversary are found dead in Massachusetts home
description: A suspect was accused of murder Monday in the slaying of three people — a couple celebrating their 50th wedding anniversary and the 97-year-old mother of one of the victims, authorities in Massachusetts said.

title: Mutiny and mayhem in Russia viewed as a boon for Ukraine
description: Prigozhin's decision to pull back Wagner troops from Moscow stymied Ukraine's hopes Putin may be overthrown. The turmoil could still prove to be a boon for Kyiv's forces, however.

title: Twitter shows users police brutality and anti-vaccine videos on TikTok copycat
description: After Twitter owner Elon Musk tweeted about a feature on the site that copies TikTok's signature functionality, users discovered a stream of disturbing videos.
